title: Wipro AI-Powered Platform
description: A comprehensive case study of designing and implementing an AI-powered platform for Wipro, including user research, pain point analysis, solution architecture, and complete product design with measurable outcomes.

images.title: Wipro AI Platform - Case Study
images.description: Complete case study covering project overview, user personas, pain points analysis, current state assessment, solution design, implementation timeline, UI/UX mockups, and business outcomes.
